text: This mod will randomise the Fealty of each Elector Count at the start of a new Empire campaign (where the Fealty system is applicable).\\n\\nRequires starting a new campaign.\\n\\nYou can configure the minimum and maximum random values.
Checked: mod will trigger at the start of a new Empire campaign.\\n\\nUnchecked: mod will not trigger.
Minimum Fealty the randomisation will allow.\\n\\nMake sure this value is less than Maximum Fealty!
Maximum Fealty the randomisation will allow.\\n\\nMake sure this value is more than Minimum Fealty!
